resources.string: Choose which numberal is greater?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.

Congratulations, the level 1 is completed!\n Do you know that the number 7 is the happiest number? There are 7 days in a week, 7 continents, 7 musical notes, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 days of Creation and much more?\n Also, the number 7 is often the favorite number of people all around the world.
Choose which Roman digit is greater?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
Congratulations, the level 2 is completed!\n Do you know that in Roman numerals there is no digit zero?
Which animal has more mass?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
Congratulations, the level 3 is completed!\n Large creature is not necessarily a predators, usually they are herbivores.
Choose edible.\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.

Congratulations, the level 4 is completed!\n It is known that many crocodiles swallow stones. But isn\'t because they are edible for them, stones help crocodiles to sink into the water quickly and help stay at the bottom.
Which card is stronger?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
Congratulations, the level 5 is completed!\n Do you know in some card games the strength of the cards is looped and the deuce hits the ace?
Which vehicle is faster?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
Congratulations, the level 6 is completed!\n You need learn to drive all of these vehicles and only bycicle and skate you don\'t need special driven license.
Which planet of Solar system is farther from the Sun?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
Congratulations, the level 7 is completed!\n Do you the nines planet Pluto has been demoted into the category of planetoids, like Vesta, Cerera, Sedna etc.?
Which thing is havier?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
Congratulations, the level 8 is completed!\n Do you know that in vacuum weights and brick will fall with the same acceleration?
Which clock has more time?\n Consider period 0:00 - 12:00.\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
Congratulations, the level 9 is completed!\n Do you know that even a broken clock twice a day shows the exact time? :)
Choose which think will float?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
Congratulations, the level 10 is completed!\n Do you know that if an egg sinks - it is fresh, if it floats - not?.
Choose which digit is greater?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
Congratulations, the level 11 is completed!\n Do you know that Roman numerals isn\'t in common use? It uses only on the dials of watches and for the centuries designation.
Choose fruit?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
Congratulations, the level 12 is completed!\n Do you know that a banana is called a fruit in supermarkets, although it is actually a berry.
Choose a creature that currently exists?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.

Congratulations, the level 13 is completed!\n Water bear or tardigrades. A microscopic creature that can survive in the temperature range from +150 degrees Celsius to absolute zero, and is also able to live for more than 10 years without water.
Choose, what is louder?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
Congratulations, the level 14 is completed!\n If you go away from the noise source two times further, the noise level fall 4 times. L ~ 1/R2
Choose, who lives longer?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.

Congratulations, the level 15 is completed!\n Jellyfish Turritopsis dohrnii presumably immortal creatures. Their secret is that when they are threatened with death, they return to their initial stage - polyps - and take off their clones. This process can last an infinite number of times.
